PackageOracle.name: DA_TERRITORY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TERRITORY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.685749000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_territory;

body.name: DA_TERRITORY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TERRITORY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.697302000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_territory.add(fx), parms=' || country_id || '|' || territory_type_nm || '|' || territory_nm || '|' || territory_iso_alpha_2_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_territory a
(
a.territory_id
,a.country_id
,a.territory_type_nm
,a.territory_nm
,a.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_territory_id.NEXTVAL
,add.country_id
,add.territory_type_nm
,add.territory_nm
,add.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.territory_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_territory.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_territory.add, parms=' || country_id || '|' || territory_type_nm || '|' || territory_nm || '|' || territory_iso_alpha_2_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_territory a
(
a.territory_id
,a.country_id
,a.territory_type_nm
,a.territory_nm
,a.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_territory_id.NEXTVAL
,add.country_id
,add.territory_type_nm
,add.territory_nm
,add.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_territory.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,territory_type_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_iso_alpha_2_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_territory.add, parms=' || territory_id || '|' || country_id || '|' || territory_type_nm || '|' || territory_nm || '|' || territory_iso_alpha_2_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_territory a
(
a.territory_id
,a.country_id
,a.territory_type_nm
,a.territory_nm
,a.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.territory_id
,add.country_id
,add.territory_type_nm
,add.territory_nm
,add.territory_iso_alpha_2_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_territory.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_territory.del, parms=' || territory_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_territory a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.territory_id = del.territory_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_territory.del');

END del;

END da_territory;
